title: My Curriculum Vitae
profil: Certified DevOps Application Designer and Developer  with front-end and project management experience. Specialised in ergonomic UX/UI and responsive interfaces creation (React, Next.js), I optimise development processes in an agile environment. My experience allows me to interact with a large variety of profiles and collaborate efficiently with multidisciplinary teams. Thus ensuring that product priorities and objectives are managed smoothly.
